Desc.entry: An action and campaign group which strives to achieve better pensions, benefits and facilities for older people. Resources include office equipment, photocopier, computer access and meeting room. Affiliated to National Pensioners Convention.

ContactName.entry: Councillor Peter Price, Chair/Jacqui Milner, Secretary/Roland Thurston, Vice-Chair/ Hilda Sables

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Wed & Fri 10am-2pm (office times); 3rd Tues in the month at 11am (general meeting), Wed 1-4pm (Whist Group)
